metadata.title: CVE-2023-51043 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.4.5, drivers/gpu/drm/drm_atomic.c has ause-after-free during a race condition between a nonblocking atomic commitand a driver unload.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
